data.comment: The match is underway in Daegu.
Daegu's Cesinha breaks free at Daegu Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Daegu.
Dejan Damjanovic is on target to give Daegu a 1-0 advantage.
Jeong Seung-won instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 4, Gwangju attack but Eom Won-sang's header doesn't find the target.
Kim Hee-Gon awards Daegu a goal kick.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Daegu.
In Daegu Daegu attack through Kim Dae-won. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
In the minute 7, Kim Hee-Gon signals a Gwangju throw-in in Daegu's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Daegu close to the penalty box.
Cesinha of Daegu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Daegu in Daegu.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Daegu have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 11, Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
In the minute 16, Daegu have a goal kick.
Daegu have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Gwangju have been awarded a penalty in Daegu...
Goal! The away team are now level through a Felipe Silva penalty.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 26, In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
Can Gwangju capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 30, Gwangju take a 1-2 lead thanks to Rustamjon Ashurmatov.
Daegu's Kim Woo-seok breaks free at Daegu Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kim Hee-Gon awards Gwangju a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Kim Hee-Gon signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Daegu's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Gwangju.
In the minute 41, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daegu apply pressure at Daegu Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Cesinha but the strike hits the bar!
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Gwangju at Daegu Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick in a good position for Daegu!
Daegu's Cesinha misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Gwangju have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Gwangju.
Gwangju will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Daegu.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 49, Tsubasa Nishi hits the bar with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Daegu in Daegu.
Daegu have been given a penalty...
Hong Jun-ho (Gwangju) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, Cesinha levels the score at 2-2 from the penalty spot.
Kim Hee-Gon waits before resuming play because Felipe Silva for Gwangju is still down.
Felipe Silva is back on the pitch.
In the minute 52, Free kick Gwangju.
Gwangju push upfield and Hong Jun-ho gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Daegu defence.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
In the minute 55, Daegu's Kim Dae-won gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Gwangju's Eom Won-sang gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
Important block from the Gwangju defence as Kim Dae-won fires in a strike for Daegu.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Gwangju at Daegu Stadium.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a Daegu throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 59, Kim Hee-Gon awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Goal! Willyan gives Gwangju a 2-3 lead in Daegu.
In the minute 61, That's a fine assist from Lee Min-ki.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
Goal! Gwangju extend their lead to 2-4 through Felipe Silva.
In the minute 63, Willyan with an assist there.
The match at Daegu Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Du Hyeon-seok, who is down injured.
Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) is making a first substitution, with Edgar Silva replacing Jeong Tae-wook.
In the minute 65, Du Hyeon-seok, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Kim Hyo-gi is the substitute for Gwangju.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Daegu are back in the match in Daegu. Edgar Silva has scored to make it 3-4.
In the minute 67, Great play from Kim Dong-jin to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Kim Hee-Gon awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Tsubasa Nishi with Ryu Jae-moon. This is the second substitution made today by Lee Byeong-keun.
Daegu are in shooting range from this free kick.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
In the minute 73, Daegu to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Lee Byeong-keun is making the team's third substitution at Daegu Stadium with Lee Jin-hyun replacing Kim Seon-min.
Im Min-hyeok is replacing Eom Won-sang for the away team.
Daegu pushes forward through Cesinha, whose finish on goal is saved.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Daegu to check on Willyan, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 79, Willyan (Gwangju) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Kim Ju-kong.
It's now 3-5 in Daegu as Im Min-hyeok scores for Gwangju.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
In the minute 82, Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Kim Ju-kong extends Gwangju's lead to 3-6.
Great play from Im Min-hyeok to set up the goal.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Daegu.
Jo Jin-woo (Daegu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
In the minute 88, Daegu push upfield but Kim Hee-Gon quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Daegu.
Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Gwangju.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a Daegu throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Throw-in for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
It's 4-6 as the referee blows for full-time.
Jeong Seung-won for Daegu has been booked by Kim Hee-Gon and receives a first yellow card.
Cesinha puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 4-6.
That's a fine assist from Edgar Silva.
